law.catch_line: The motor carrier tax imposed under § 9-202 of this subtitle does not apply to a commercial motor v...
law.text:
The motor carrier tax imposed under § 9-202 of this subtitle does not apply to a commercial motor vehicle that:
is operated by a motor carrier that leases the commercial motor vehicle from another motor carrier who provides or pays for the motor fuel; or
is operated by a motor carrier that has obtained a trip permit under § 9-219(c) of this subtitle.
